data.text: Even though enemy soldiers have destroyed the descendants of [MTY] Jacob,
The shields of the enemy soldiers who are coming to attack you will shine red as the sun shines on them,
Their chariots will dash through the streets of Nineveh
Meanwhile, your king will summon his officers
But, the gates of the dams on the rivers will be thrown open by enemy soldiers,
The queen will have her clothes stripped off her by enemy soldiers,
The people will rush from Nineveh
The enemy attackers say to each other, â€œSeize the silver!
Soon everything valuable in the city will be seized or ruined.
After that happens, people will say,
The soldiers in Nineveh were like [MET] lions that killed or strangled other animals
The Commander of the armies of angels says to the people of Nineveh,
